Sentencas: LSGM (La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.8Mg0.2O3) and LSM (La0.9Sr0.1MnO3) are attractive electrolyte and electrode materials, respectively, for the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: Since both materials are based on perovskite structure, the reaction between them is easily expected.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: In this study, various compositions of LaSr(GaMg)(1-x)MnxO3 or xLSM-(1-x)LSGM (x=0-1) system were prepared to identify the possible reaction products and to see their effects on the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: Powder compacts were prepared by using the solid-state reaction method and sintered at 1500 degreesC for 6 h. The phase, analyzed from X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns, changed from the single-phase cubic (0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.12) to the mixture of cubic and hexagonal phases (0.12<0.20) and finally to the mixture of hexagonal and orthorhombic phases (0.2<1).
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: Hexagonal and orthorhombic phases are dominant in 0.2less than or equal toxless than or equal to0.4 and 0.7less than or equal toxless than or equal to1.0, respectively.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: The diffraction peaks of two phases were overlapped and could not be easily separated, and the normalized unit cell volume seemed to change rapidly in 0.4<0.7, reflecting the chan-e from the hexagonal-phase dominance to the orthorhombic-phase dominance.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of (1-x)LSGM-xLSM, measured by four-probe d.c. method between 430 and 9 10 degreesC in air, decreased with increasing LSM content in the cubic composition range, showing the harmful effect of the LSM on the conductivity of the LSGM electrolyte.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: The conductivity decrease was explained by both the increase in the activation energy and the decrease in the charge carrier concentration.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system

Sentencas: Above x=0.16, the conductivity increased rapidly, showing the effect of percolation by the conductive orthorhombic phase.
Titulo: Phase characterization and electrical conductivity of LaSr(GaMg)1-xMnxO3 system
